Heading: Text (eye-readable)
Note: Readable text of the main work: this value is required, together with applicable <ProductForm> and <ProductFormDetail> values, to designate an e-book or other digital or physical product whose primary content is eye-readable text

Heading: Extensive links between internal content
Note: E-publication contains a significant number of actionable cross-references, hyperlinked notes and annotations, or with other actionable links between largely textual elements (eg quiz/test questions, ‘choose your own ending’ etc)

Heading: Extensive links to external content
Note: E-publication contains a significant number of actionable (clickable) web links

Heading: Additional eye-readable text not part of main work
Note: Publication contains additional textual content such as interview, feature article, essay, bibliography, quiz/test, other background material or text that is not included in a primary or ‘unenhanced’ version

Heading: Additional eye-readable links to external content
Note: Publication contains a significant number of web links (printed URLs, QR codes etc). For use in ONIX 3.0 only

Heading: Promotional text for other book product
Note: eg Teaser chapter

Heading: Still images / graphics
Note: Use only when no more detailed specification is provided

Heading: Photographs
Note: Whether in a plate section / insert, or not

Heading: Figures, diagrams, charts, graphs
Note: Including other ‘mechanical’ (ie non-photographic) illustrations

Heading: Additional images / graphics not part of main work
Note: Publication is enhanced with additional images or graphical content such as supplementary photographs that are not included in a primary or ‘unenhanced’ version

Heading: Assessment material
Note: eg Questions or student exercises, problems, quizzes or tests (as an integral part of the work). For use in ONIX 3.0 only

Heading: Audiobook
Note: Audio recording of a reading of a book or other text

Heading: Performance – spoken word
Note: Audio recording of a drama or other spoken word performance

Heading: Other speech content
Note: eg an interview, speech, lecture or discussion, not a ‘reading’ or ‘performance’)

Heading: Music recording
Note: Audio recording of a music performance, including musical drama and opera

Heading: Other audio
Note: Audio recording of other sound, eg birdsong

Heading: Partial performance – spoken word
Note: Audio recording of a reading, performance or dramatization of part of the work

Heading: Additional audio content not part of main work
Note: Product is enhanced with audio recording of full or partial reading, performance, dramatization, interview, background documentary or other audio content not included in the primary or ‘unenhanced’ version

Heading: Promotional audio for other book product
Note: eg Reading of teaser chapter

Heading: Video
Note: Includes Film, video, animation etc. Use only when no more detailed specification is provided. Formerly ‘Moving images’

Heading: Performance – visual
Note: Video recording of a drama or other performance, including musical performance

Heading: Animated / interactive illustrations
Note: eg animated diagrams, charts, graphs or other illustrations

Heading: Narrative animation
Note: eg cartoon, animatic or CGI animation

Heading: Other video
Note: Other video content eg interview, not a reading or performance

Heading: Partial performance – video
Note: Video recording of a reading, performance or dramatization of part of the work

Heading: Additional video content not part of main work
Note: E-publication is enhanced with video recording of full or partial reading, performance, dramatization, interview, background documentary or other content not included in the primary or ‘unenhanced’ version

Heading: Promotional video for other book product
Note: eg Book trailer

Heading: Game / Puzzle
Note: No multi-user functionality. Formerly just ‘Game’

Heading: Contest
Note: Includes some degree of multi-user functionality

Heading: Software
Note: Largely ‘content free’

Heading: Data
Note: Data files

Heading: Blank pages or spaces
Note: Entire pages or blank spaces, forms, boxes etc, intended to be filled in by the reader

Heading: Advertising content
Note: Use only where type of advertising content is not stated

Heading: Advertising – first party
Note: ‘Back ads’ – promotional pages for other books (that do not include sample content, cf codes 17, 23)

Heading: Advertising – coupons
Note: Eg to obtain discounts on other products

Heading: Scripting
Note: E-publication contains microprograms written (eg) in Javascript and executed within the reading system. For use in ONIX 3.0 only
